thread.title: Apple's New M3 Pro MacBook Pro Gets an Epic $300 Price Drop
thread.title_full: Apple's New M3 Pro MacBook Pro Gets an Epic $300 Price Drop

author: Christine McKee
title: Apple's New M3 Pro MacBook Pro Gets an Epic $300 Price Drop
text: The upgraded 14-inch MacBook Pro sports the M3 Pro chip with a 12-core CPU and 18-core GPU, along with 1TB of storage. At $300 off, you can pick up the Space Black laptop at the lowest price seen to date. B&H has issued even more year-end discounts, with MacBook Pros seeing price drops of up to $1,700 off. One top seller, though, is Apple's latest M3 Pro 14-inch MacBook Pro with an upgraded CPU and GPU core count (12 and 18 cores respectively) and a bump up to 1TB of storage. Now $2,099 when ordered in the sleek Space Black finish, this laptop also qualifies for free 2-day shipping within the contiguous U.S. for fast delivery to your door. Buy for $2,099 According to our M3 Pro 14-inch MacBook Pro Price Guide, which tracks the best MacBook Pro deals across popular retailers, B&H's $300 price drop is the best available, with other Apple resellers charging at least $100 more. For even more year-end markdowns, be sure to check out this week's roundup of B&H deals on Apple or jump to the company's Mega Deal Zone page for hundreds of additional offers. Snap up these savings before the New Year If you're doing year-end shopping for your company or are looking to score the best deal on a new MacBook Pro, there are dozens of bargains to be found in our Apple Price Guide. A few top picks are highlighted below: Best Buy launches year-end Apple AirTag sale Apple's M3 Pro MacBook Pro with 36GB RAM drops to record-low $1,999 B&H slashes Apple's M2 Pro MacBook Pro to $1,599, save $400 now Year-end Mega Deal Zone knocks up to $2,000 off Apple Apple's upgraded M3 MacBook Pro 14-inch just dropped to $1,499
